structure.unit: A AUTOMATED MOTOR VEHICLE REGISTRATION SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Fees credited to trust and agency account.
law.text: All fees to be credited to the state shall be deposited to a trust and agency account within the transportation fund to be used in defraying the cabinet's costs and expenses of administering a vehicle titling program.
law.history: Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 164, sec. 68, effective July 15, 1982.
